EmailTemplate.subject: Is your Huntington Technology Lease Expiring? What to do next
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear Owner Operator: You are receiving this email because you may have a lease expiring soon with hardware purchased through the NCR Program with Huntington Financial. If you do, Huntington will be sending communications 60 days from the lease expiration date with your 4 options. In the meantime, NCR wants to ensure you have time to review your 4 options in advance. Please see below. - Sign a new lease with HTF and NCR. - Extend the existing lease for 6 months after which the lease will terminate, and the ownership of all leased equipment will transfer to the owner/operator. - Purchase the leased equipment at the end of the leased term for 10% of the original financed amount. - Direct buy or finance (with payment plan) new equipment. For more information regarding what is on your lease, please contact Huntington directly to send you the information @ mcdonalds.support@huntington.Atlassian.net. If you are looking to receive new leased hardware, please contact NCR @ Mcdonalds.orders@ncr.com or call 1-800-421-8230.
